architectural_elements.name: Stone or Wooden Countertops
architectural_elements.description: Worn, stained countertops with cracks, knife marks, and signs of heavy use.

architectural_elements.name: Brick Oven
architectural_elements.description: A large, soot-covered brick oven with a rusty iron door. The inside may glow faintly or emit ghostly heat.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Shelves
architectural_elements.description: Open shelves lined with dusty jars, cracked dishes, and rusted cooking utensils.

architectural_elements.name: Stone or Dirt Floor
architectural_elements.description: Uneven, cracked flooring with stains, spilled ingredients, or mysterious puddles.

architectural_elements.name: Small Windows
architectural_elements.description: Grimy, barred windows letting in minimal light, with cobwebs in the corners.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Table
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, sturdy table in the center of the kitchen, covered in scratches, stains, and half-prepared meals.

furniture_and_decor.name: Cast Iron Pots and Pans
furniture_and_decor.description: Heavy, rusted pots and pans hanging from hooks or stacked haphazardly on shelves.

furniture_and_decor.name: Knife Block
furniture_and_decor.description: A wooden block holding an assortment of knives, some missing or covered in rust.

furniture_and_decor.name: Pantry Shelves
furniture_and_decor.description: Shelves stocked with jars of preserved food, some labeled with strange symbols or containing unknown substances.

furniture_and_decor.name: Hearth Tools
furniture_and_decor.description: A set of iron tools for the fireplace or oven, covered in soot and rust.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the shelves, ceiling beams, and corners.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust and Grime
atmospheric_details.description: Layers of dust on surfaces, with grime built up in the corners and crevices.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: A single lantern or candle casting uneven, flickering light, creating long shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Clanging
atmospheric_details.description: The sound of pots and pans clanging, or utensils moving on their own.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden chills near the oven or pantry, with visible breath in the air.

interactive_objects.name: Recipe Book
interactive_objects.description: An old, stained recipe book with handwritten notes, some pages torn or containing cryptic instructions.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: A key hidden in a jar, under a pot, or behind a loose brick, used to unlock another area.

interactive_objects.name: Mysterious Jar
interactive_objects.description: A jar labeled with strange symbols, containing an unknown substance or glowing liquid.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A pocket watch left on the counter or shelf, tied to a time-based puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A loose floorboard or secret panel behind the shelves, containing a note or small artifact.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains or hanging utensils moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the oven or pantry.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Spills
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the countertop, floor, or cutting board, hinting at past violence.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Ash or Dust
environmental_effects.description: Ash from the oven or dust drifting down from the shelves.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Faint moonlight filtering through the grimy windows, casting eerie shadows.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: A dim, flickering lantern hanging from the ceiling or placed on the table.

lighting.name: Oven Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ghostly glow emanating from the oven, even when it's not lit.
